name: Eidolon
languages: the languages it knew in life

abilities.name: Incorporeal Movement.
abilities.description: The eidolon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object other than a sacred statue.

abilities.name: Sacred Animation
abilities.description: When the eidolon moves into a space occupied by a sacred statue, the eidolon can disappear, causing the statue to become a creature under the eidolon's control. The eidolon uses the sacred statue's statistics in place of its own.

abilities.name: Turn Resistance.
abilities.description: The eidolon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.
